018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.CONSTRUCTOR;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.FIELD;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.METHOD;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PROTECTED;
024import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
027
028import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
029import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
030import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
031import javax.lang.model.element.ElementVisitor;
032import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
033import javax.lang.model.element.Name;
034import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
035import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Set;
038
039import org.apiguardian.api.API;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
041
042/**
043 *  The wrapper for an
044 *  {@link Element}
045 *  instance, enhanced by information needed for the creation of the UML graph.
046 *
047 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: UMLElement.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.0.5
050 *
051 *  @UMLGraph.link
052 */
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLElement.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
055public abstract class UMLElement implements Element
056{
057        /*-----------*\
058    ====** Constants **========================================================
059        \*-----------*/
060    /**
061     *  An empty array of {@code UMLElement} objects.
062     */
063    public static final UMLElement [] EMPTY_UMLElement_ARRAY = new UMLElement [0];
064
065        /*------------*\
066    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
067        \*------------*/
068    /**
069     *  The wrapped element.
070     */
071    private final Element m_Wrapped;
072
073        /*--------------*\
074    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
075        \*--------------*/
076    /**
077     *  Creates a new {@code UMLElement} instance.
078     *
079     *  @param  element The wrapped element.
080     */
081    protected UMLElement( final Element element )
082    {
083        m_Wrapped = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" );
084    }   //  UMLElement()
085
086        /*---------*\
087    ====** Methods **==========================================================
088        \*---------*/
089    /**
090     *  {@inheritDoc}
091     */
092    @Override
093    public final <R,P> R accept( final ElementVisitor<R,P> visitor, final P payload )
094    {
095        return m_Wrapped.accept( visitor, payload );
096    }   //  accept()
097
098    /**
099     *  {@inheritDoc}
100     */
101    @Override
102    public final TypeMirror asType() { return m_Wrapped.asType(); }
103
104    /**
105     *  {@inheritDoc}
106     */
107    @Override
108    public final <A extends Annotation> A getAnnotation( final Class<A> annotationType )
109    {
110        return m_Wrapped.getAnnotation( annotationType );
111    }   //  getAnnotation()
112
113    /**
114     *  {@inheritDoc}
115     */
116    @Override
117    public final <A extends Annotation> A [] getAnnotationsByType( final Class<A> annotationType )
118    {
119        return m_Wrapped.getAnnotationsByType( annotationType );
120    }   //  getAnnotationsByType()
121
122    /**
123     *  {@inheritDoc}
124     */
125    @Override
126    public final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> getAnnotationMirrors() { return m_Wrapped.getAnnotationMirrors(); }
127
128    /**
129     *  {@inheritDoc}
130     */
131    @Override
132    public final List<? extends Element> getEnclosedElements() { return m_Wrapped.getEnclosedElements(); }
133
134    /**
135     *  {@inheritDoc}
136     */
137    @Override
138    public Element getEnclosingElement() { return m_Wrapped.getEnclosingElement(); }
139
140    /**
141     *  {@inheritDoc}
142     */
143    @Override
144    public final ElementKind getKind() { return m_Wrapped.getKind(); }
145
146    /**
147     *  {@inheritDoc}
148     */
149    @Override
150    public final Set<Modifier> getModifiers() { return m_Wrapped.getModifiers(); }
151
152    /**
153     *  {@inheritDoc}
154     */
155    @Override
156    public final Name getSimpleName() { return m_Wrapped.getSimpleName(); }
157
158    /**
159     *  Tests whether the given element is part of an API or not. The
160     *  consideration is, that only element that are either {@code public} or
161     *  {@code protected} are part of the API of a class.
162     *
163     *  @param  element The element to test.
164     *  @return {@code true} if the element is part of the API, {@code false}
165     *      otherwise.
166     */
167    public static final boolean isAPI( final Element element )
168    {
169        final var modifiers = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getModifiers();
170        final var retValue = modifiers.contains( PUBLIC ) || modifiers.contains( PROTECTED );
171
172        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
173        return retValue;
174    }   //  isAPI()
175
176    /**
177     *  Tests whether the given element represents a field.
178     *
179     *  @param  element The element to test.
180     *  @return {@code true} if the element represents a field (but not an
181     *      enum value constant), {@code false} otherwise.
182     */
183    public static final boolean isAttribute( final Element element ) { return requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getKind() == FIELD; }
184
185    /**
186     *  Tests whether the given element represents a constructor.
187     *
188     *  @param  element The element to test.
189     *  @return {@code true} if the element represents a constructor,
190     *      {@code false} otherwise.
191     */
192    public static final boolean isConstructor( final Element element ) { return requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getKind() == CONSTRUCTOR; }
193
194    /**
195     *  Tests whether the given element represents a method.
196     *
197     *  @param  element The element to test.
198     *  @return {@code true} if the element represents a method,
199     *      {@code false} otherwise.
200     */
201    public static final boolean isMethod( final Element element ) { return requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getKind() == METHOD; }
202}
203//  class UMLElement
204
205/*
206 *  End of File
207 */
